typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		NodeId as string,
		ApplicationUri as string,
		Value as (Value as string, SourceTimestamp as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	wildcardPaths:['{name}.json']) ~> messageOutput
messageOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: '',
	format: 'cdm',
	corpusPath: '',
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: '',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> hack2020sink
